name: CDS-Data-Extract
description: Used to extract Data from a CDS to source control so it can be packaged
author: Shawn Lautebach

inputs.name: ConnectionString
inputs.label: CDS Connection String
inputs.helpMarkDown: The Connection String to the CDS to extract the data from. For more information on format: https://msdn.microsoft.com/en-gb/library/mt608573.aspx

inputs.name: SharedViewName
inputs.label: Shared View Name
inputs.helpMarkDown: The name of the shared view across all entities to extract.  Note for N2N relationships, create a shared view with this name and postfix it with '-N2N

inputs.name: DataExtractOutputFolder
inputs.label: Data Extract Folder
inputs.helpMarkDown: The relative output folder where to extract all the data to in Source Control.

inputs.name: ExtractFiledsAsFiles
inputs.label: Extact data fields as files
inputs.helpMarkDown: This enables the task to extract configured data fields from the extracted data to be additionally extracted to source control.  This is useful if you wish to extract blobs of data for code reviews.  Examples of this is extracting portals javascript, css, webtemplates, etc.

inputs.name: ExtractFiledsRootFolder
inputs.label: Source control folder to extract fields to as files.
inputs.helpMarkDown: The root path to extract the data fields to.

inputs.name: ExtractFiledsConfigType
inputs.label: Extract Fields Configuration Type
inputs.helpMarkDown: The root path to extract the data fields to.

inputs.name: ExtractFiledsConfigFile
inputs.label: JSON Configuration to specify what data fields are to be extracted.
inputs.helpMarkDown: The root path to extract the data fields to.

inputs.name: ExtractFiledsConfig
inputs.label: JSON Configuration to specify what data fields are to be extracted.
inputs.helpMarkDown: The root path to extract the data fields to.
